Skip to content Unboxing the Bizarre(tm) Giving the Offbeat, Zany, and Bizarre Holidays their Time in the Spotlight! Menu Reviews and Sneak Peaks Subscriber Pictures Past Boxes Press Releases Current Promos OUR PROCLAIMED NATIONAL HOLIDAY Meet The Team Shop February 9th National Pizza Day Tag: US Marines May 19th Armed Forces Day May Holidays, Unboxing the Bizarre Today we celebrate those branches of military service that have served our country since it began. The day was created by Secretary of Defense Louis Johnson on August 31, 1949. It was signed into law by President Harry Truman on February 20, 1950. Finally beginning to be celebrated later that same year on May 19th. Prior to today, each branched celebrate their own birthdays, such as the US Army who formed in 1775. Obviously they were around for the American Revolution and have served as the main battle force ever since. The Navy formed the same year since the Revolutionary War took to the seas as well as on land. Ill prepared, the US Navy did a tremendous job with the few ships they had in service. The Marines formed as well in 1775, serving primarily aboard the ships as sharpshooters and landing forces. Since then the Marines have been the first to arrive in nearly every military engagement America has been involved in. To many people's surprise, the US Air Force did not form in 1947. Prior to that it was a part of the US Army. Today it is a major strike force and a very deterrent defense against aggressors. During World War 2 the air force (Army) were among the few forces that could actually win against the mighty German Tiger tanks. And far too often forgotten is the US Coast Guard. These men and women are known more for saving lives on the seas but it is their job to protect our borders from drugs, other illegal substances and invaders. While the US Navy is charged with foreign service it is the Coast Guard who keep watch at home. How to celebrate - Thank those who serve, and have served, in our military forces. Study the history of each branch more closely. Be proud to be an American. Edhe pse situata ka qene e tensionuar kohet e fundit nga arrestimi i tij, "tradhetia" dhe thashethemet e tjera, Keisi duket se ka vendosur t'i hedhe pas te gjitha. Blogu i saj titullohet pikerisht "te jetosh jeten e gruas se nje reperi". "Me eshte dashur te mendoj shume nese duhet te hap nje blog apo jo, sidomos sepse e vleresoj privatesine time, por pas gjithe ketyre zhvillimeve te reja ne jeten time... Mendoj se privatesia me eshte hedhur nga dritarja. Te qenit e martuar me nje reper shqiptar me ka vendosur ne qender te vemendjes qe njerezit te gjykojne dhe komentojne jeten time. Edhe pse martesa ndikon ne jeten time, nuk me perkufizon mua, prandaj po zgjedh te ndaj me ju per veten dhe gjerat qe kane vlere per mua."- ka shkruar ajo ne postimin e pare te blogut. keisistres Nga kategoria Pse nentori eshte muaji me depresiv i vitit Studimi/ Keto jane punet me stresuese ne bote Burak Ozcivit,gjendje e renduar nga fama Pese hapa per te patur nje dite te suksesshme Personazhet qe vuajne nga depresioni Studimi/ Keto jane 10 punet me stresuese ne bote Me te lexuarat e javes FOTO/ Zbulohet skena e Donald Trump ne nje film pornografik5 dite me pare13/11/2018Ceremonia ku socialistet varrosen te majten3 dite me pare15/11/2018E bujshme/ Perplasje mes Melania dhe Ivanka Trump ne Shtepine e Bardhe6 dite me pare12/11/2018FOTO/ Rama hoqi shqiponjen, por plas ironia ne rrjet5 dite me pare12/11/2018Historia e vajzes nga Elbasani/ Pasi me tradhtoi i dashuri, nuk u rezistoj dot meshkujve te tjere5 dite me pare12/11/2018Sander Lleshi si nje PPP banale5 dite me pare12/11/2018Top Channel merr anen e Rames ne sherrin me Meten5 dite me pare13/11/2018Unaza e Re/ Televizionet nen cizmen e Erion Veliajt6 dite me pare12/11/2018 1 Comment Naseri thote: 08/11/2018 te 10:50 Po kush te ndjek ty moj bibeee! Tsentr mizhnarodnoyi bezpeki ta partnerstva International Security and Partnership Center FacebookTwitterLinkedinSkype Golovna Novini Pro tsentr Publikatsiyi Konferentsiyi Konkursi Forum Summer Academy 2015 Menu back Poshuk U Pol'shchi startuiut' masshtabni viis'kovi navchannia NATO Za misiats' do Varshavs'kogo samitu NATO u pol's'kii stolitsi ofitsiino dali start viis'kovim manevram pid nazvoiu "Anakonda-2016". U tseremoniyi vidkrittia v ponedilok, 6 chervnia, vziali uchast' posol SShA u Pol'shchi Pol Dzhons ta ministr oboroni krayini Antonii Macherevich. Sami navchannia rozpochnut'sia 7 chervnia, u nikh viz'mut' uchast' ponad 30 tisiach viis'kovosluzhbovtsiv, tri tisiachi odinits' viis'kovoyi tekhniki, desiatki boiovikh litakiv i korabliv. Trivatimut' naibil'shi ts'ogo roku manevri NATO do 17 chervnia. U navchanniakh viz'mut' uchast' viis'kovosluzhbovtsi 19 krayin Al'iansu. Zokrema 14 tisiach uchasnikiv pribuli do Pol'shchi iz SShA. Do uchasti u navchanniakh, iaki ie chastinoiu zakhodiv NATO z "vidliakuvannia" Rosiyi pislia aneksiyi Krimu, zaprosili takozh Ukrayinu ta Gruziiu. Iak utochnili u minoboroni Ukrayini, z ukrayins'kogo boku do uchasti v manevrakh zaluchat' 35 viis'kovosluzhbovtsiv desantnikh viis'k Zbroinikh sil Ukrayini zi shtatnoiu viis'kovoiu tekhnikoiu, a takozh shtabnikh ofitseriv zi skladu komanduvannia Litovs'ko-pol's'ko-ukrayins'koyi brigadi - spil'nogo pidrozdilu tr'okh krayin. Natomist' u Rosiyi neodnorazovo nagoloshuvali, shcho bud'-iaka prisutnist' viis'k NATO poblizu yiyi kordoniv roztsiniuvatimet'sia iak zagroza i shcho bude "vzhito zakhodiv". Shchodo "Anakondi" predstavnik MZS Rosiyi Oleksii Mieshkov zaiaviv, shcho "tsi manevri ie destabilizuiuchimi i yikhnia golovna meta - zrostannia napruzhenosti na kordonakh Rosiyi". Navchannia "Anakonda" rozpochalisia v Pol'shchi 2006 roku. Kil'kist' krayin-uchasnikiv navchan' postiino zrostaie. Home Lajme Bota NATO: Marshim trupash ne Lindje NATO: Marshim trupash ne Lindje on: January 08, 2017 Gjeneralmajori i ushtrise gjermane, Bundeswehr, Josef Blotz e quan "nje operacion te madh logjistik". Tri anije te marines se SHBA-se ngarkojne nderkohe ne Bremerhaven ngarkesen e tyre: arme dhe pajisje te brigades tankiste te divizionit te katert te kembesorise te SHBA. Gjithsej 900 makina me mallra, te cilat do te krijonin bashke nje varg prej 14 kilometrash do te kalojne ditet e ardhshme neper Gjermanine e Veriut dhe pastaj me tej ne Poloni, dhe vec tyre edhe shume autokolona me kamione. Operacioni "Atlantic Resolve" eshte nje shenje e angazhimit te vazhdueshem te SHBA per Evropen per stabilizimin e paqes, tha ne Bremerhaven Timothy McGuire, zevendeskomandanti i pergjithshem i forcave te armatosura tokesore te SHBA ne Evrope. Vitin e kaluar SHBA beri te ditur se do te dergoje nje brigade te perhershme luftarake shtese ne Evrope. Presidenti Barack Obama do t'u jape siguri para se gjithash Polonise, Estonise, Letonise dhe Lituanise, se ne pikepamje ushtarake SHBA jane prane tyre. Keto shtete ndihen te kercenuara nga agresioni rus ne Ukraine. Amerikanet jane pjese e nje strategjie te gjere te NATO-s. Qe prej ketij viti, aleanca do te stacionoje kater brigada luftarake multinacionale, secila me rreth njemije ushtare ne Poloni dhe ne tri shtetet baltike. Kjo bazohet ne nje vendim te takimit te nivelit te larte te NATO-s te gushtit te vitit te kaluar. Ne perforcimin e pranise se NATO-s ne Lindje ben pjese edhe stacionimi i nje batalioni gjerman me deri 500 ushtare ne Lituani, ne veri te te ashtuquajturit Boshllek i Suvalkit. Ky korridor i ngushte tokesor prej rreth 65 kilometrash ne vije ajrore konsiderohet si thembra e Akilit e NATO-s ne rastin e nje mbrojtjeje te mundshme te shteteve baltike. Vringellim shpatash apo sigurim defensiv i paqes? Sekretari i Pergjithshem i NATO-s, Jens Stoltenberg e quajti para pak ditesh operacionin "te matur dhe defensiv" dhe tha se ai siguron paqen: "Ne ndodhemi ne nje situate, ne te cilen pala ruse po armatoset intensivisht dhe duket se ka vullnetin qe te perdore dhune kunder fqinjit te saj Ukraine." Behet fjale per nje "prani ushtarake, multinacionale te kufizuar, e cila do te tregoje se ne rrime te bashkuar dhe e mbrojme njeri-tjetrin". Stoltenbergu nuk do t'ia dije fare as per nje distancim te ardhshem te SHBA nen Trumpin, nga aleatet evropiane: Trumpi i ka thene atij "se ndihet i lidhur me NATO-n dhe me aleancen transatlantike. Vec kesaj, Kongresi ne SHBA sapo vendosi nje katerfishim te buxhetit per pranine e SHBA ne Evrope. Prandaj jam optimist se SHBA do t'u permbahen detyrimeve te tyre", tha Stoltenberg. Shtetet Baltike ne rast rreziku nuk mbahen dot Nje fjali vendimtare e Stoltenbergut megjithate duhet t'i kete zemeruar shtetet lindore te NATO-s. Ne lidhje me nje kercenim te supozuar rus, Stoltenbergu tha: "Nga Rusia nuk buron ndonje rrezik direkt per njerin nga partneret e Aleances." Njekohesisht ai tha per pranine e NATO-s se "behet fjale per disa mijera ushtare ne krahasim me dhjetera mijera ushtaret ruse." Pikerisht ne keto raporte forcash e shohin strateget problemin. Sepse po te doje Rusia, ne saje te epersise se saj te madhe ushtarake ne rajon ajo mund t'i marre pa mundim te pakten tri vendet baltike. Ne kete perfundim arrijne politikane perendimore te mbrojtjes. Ne nje analize te qendres kerkimore amerikane RAND, per te cilen bashkepunuan edhe ish-Komandanti i Pergjithshem i NATO-s, Wesley Clark dhe ish- Komandanti i NATO-s, Egon Ramms, thuhet se Rusia mund ta pushtoje lehte lidhjen tokesore midis Polonise dhe Shteteve Baltike, Boshllekun Suvalki. Kembesoria e NATO-s "nuk do te ishte ne gjendje as te terhiqej. Ajo do te shkaterrohej ne vend." Do te mbetej vetem perpjekja e rimarrjes se vendeve baltike. Por kjo do te perfundoje "ne katastrofe", thuhet ne studim. Per vendet baltike keto nuk jane rezultate qetesuese. 0SHARESShareTweet Previous A do ta lejoje Evropa Gjermanine te udheheqe? Hlavni stranka Domaci fronta Pevnost Evropa Svet Kulturni valka Film Hudba Knihy Ostatni Sport Technika Extra Historie Cestovani STV Kontakt Hledat Domu Pevnost Evropa V nemecke armade je pry nejmene 200 pravicovych extremistu Pevnost Evropa V nemecke armade je pry nejmene 200 pravicovych extremistu Od Filip Vavra - 25.10.2017 0 Facebook Twitter Google+ Pinterest WhatsApp Nemecka armada tvrdi, ze ve svych radach najde rocne nejmene 20 "pravicovych extremistu," a od roku 2008 takovych vojaku objevila asi 200. Zprava byla zverejnena pote, co clen nemeckych Zelenych vznesl pozadavek na vojenskou rozvedku v nemeckem parlamentu. Rozvedka tvrdi, ze od roku 2008 objevila v armade 200 pravicovych extremistu, coz stranu Zelenych velmi znepokojilo. Mluvci strany, Irene Mihalic, zautocila na prezidenta rozvedky kvuli jeho drivejsimu svedectvi na pude parlamentu na zacatku rijna, kde tvrdil, ze rocne objevi jen osm "nacistu." "Je to velmi nebezpecne, kdyz se podivame na to, ze vojensky trenink v Bundeswehru mohou pravicovi extremiste vyuzit ke svym cilum," rika Mihalic. President rozvedky, Christopf Gramm, vysvetluje, ze v poslednich par letech rozvedka v ozbrojenych silach zadny opravdovy narust pravicovych extremistu nezaznamenala. "Nepodarilo se nam overit, ze by pocet rozpoznanych pravicovych extremistu sel nahoru." V kvetnu tohoto roku se v jednech kasarnach nasly predmety upominajici na nacistickou minulost zeme, coz vladu prinutilo, aby provedla rozsahle inspekce i v dalsich vojenskych ubikacich. V tomto roce take urady odhalily bizarni spiknuti, ktere zahrnovalo krajne pravicoveho armadniho dustojnika, ktery se vydaval za syrskeho zadatele o azyl, a spolu s dalsimi planoval teroristicky utok. Vysetrovatele si stale nejsou jisti, zda cilem utoku bylo shodit vinu na Syrany, nebo zda melo dojit k utoku primo na azylanty. Ackoliv skutecne dukazy o rostoucim pravicovem extremismu jsou slabe, vlada presto na jeho potlacovani venuje nemalo energie. Napriklad levicova koalice, ktera vladne Berlinu, minuly rok zverejnila prohlaseni, ze aktivity krajni pravice jsou pro mesto tim nejvetsim nebezpecim. Jen par tydnu na to vjel tunisky islamista s pujcenou dodavkou do davu lidi na vanocnich trzich a 12 jich zabil. Nje person ka qelluar me arme mbi djalin e vellait te tij si pasoje e nje konflikti. "I riu ka humbur jeten nga te shtenat ndersa i dyshuari eshte i plagosur ne gjendje te rende dhe gjendet ne spital, pritet te dergohet ne Qendren Klinike Universitare te Prishtines". Ngjarja ka ndodhur ne qender te Gjilanit, pikerisht ne pjesen e njohur si lokalet e argjendareve. Bota Vizita e pare e Macron ne Berlin me kancelaren Merkel Ju sugjerojme Publikuar ne : 12:20 - 15/05/17 | E SH Vetem nje dite pasi beri betimin si president i ri i Frances, Emmanuel Macron udheton drejt Gjermanise. Ne Berlin, vizita e politikanit - qe frenoi vrullin e Marine Le Pen - pritet me interes te madh. Ne menyre te vazhdueshme gjate fushates presidenciale, 39-vjecari e kishte vene theksin tek ai qe "Deutsche Eelle" e pershkruan si motori gjermano-francez per Europen. Axhenden e takimit me Merkel do ta mbizoterojne nje sere projektesh te destinuara t'i japin bllokut nje shtyse te re. Edhe kancelarja mori nje mbeshtetje bindese per vazhdimesine ne kete post, pas triumfit te CDU-se ne njerin prej landeve me te medha te vendit, North Rhine-Eestphalia. Per 46 vite, ky rajon eshte qeverisur nga socialdemokratet. CDU ka mundur ta drejtoje per vetem 5 vite, nga 2005 deri ne 2010. "Martin Schulz e frikesoi shume Merkelin", shkruanin mediet vendase, por ama per nje kohe te shkurter. Aktualitet Mediat franceze ngrene alarmin/ Pesticidi i hashashit ne Shqiperi ka shkaterruar nje pjese derrmuese te bleteve Ju sugjerojme Publikuar ne : 10:38 - 15/05/17 | E SH Jehona e fenomenit te cuditshem te zhdukjes se bleteve ne Shqiperi gjate vitit te kaluar ka mberritur deri ne mediat franzece. "Le Courrier des Balkans" ka dhene alarmin per kete fenoment, qe eshte trajtuar dhe nga media te tjera te njohura ne France, si psh ne "TV 5monde", qe e quan kete dukuri nje katastrofe ekologjike. Artikujt referojne si shkakun kryesot te ketij fenomeni pesticidin e forte te perdorur per te kultivuar hashashin, teksa theksohet fakti se Shqiperia eshte bere prodhuesi me i madh i kanabisit ne Europe. Fermeret i trajtojne mijera bimet e hashashit me pesticideve te ndaluara, te vjetra, dhe ne sasi industriale per te shmangur semundjet dhe per te kontrolluar prodhimet e tyre. Por, bletet jane shume te ndjeshme ndaj ketyre kimikateve dhe si rrjedhoje vdesin ne sasi. Nje problem i tille eshte konstatuar me heret dhe ne Shtetet e Bashkuara te Amerikes. Me poshte artikujt e plote, publikuar mes 10 dhe 14 majit: Le Courrier des Balkans: Kultivimi i kanabisit, asyeja pse po vdesin bletet Ne nje vit, mes 2015 dhe 2016, nga rreth 360.000 koshere ne vend, mbi 142.000 nuk i kane mbijetuar dimrit te 2016-s! Kjo eshte dicka qe nuk ishte pare ndonjehere! Dhe kjo eshte dhe me tragjike pasi mijera familjeve shqiptare tradicionalisht jetojne me mjalte, e cila vleresohet si nje nga me te mirat ne bote (me mjalte Jemenit). Natyrisht, te gjithe jane ne kerkim per te kuptuar shkaqet! Eshte e vertete se dimri ishte i ashper, eshte gjithashtu e vertete se ka pasur parazite tek bletet, teksa bletaret shqiptare nuk kane mjete per te perdorur produkte moderne, te cilat jane te shtrenjta. Por kjo nuk eshte e mjaftueshme! Ka ne fakt nje arsye tjeter per nje vdekshmeri te tille: kultivimi i kanabisit! Vitet e fundit, Shqiperia eshte bere prodhuesi i pare i kanabisit ne Europe, duke lene pas Bullgarine, Kosoven dhe Serbine. Dhe flitet per qindra hektare! Per te pasur nje ide, ne vitin 2016, policia shqiptare,e ndihmuar nga policia italiane shkaterroi 2 milione e gjysme rrenje kanabis! Perte prodhuar kete sasi, shqiptaret jane duke perdorur tone pesticidesh te ndaluara, duke na dhene ne kete menyre shkakun per ate qe ka ndodhur me bletet. Prandaj po behet kerdia. Dhe kjo nuk duket se ka per te ndaluar. Se pari, per shkak se importuesit kryesore te kanabisit Shqiptar - Italia, Franca dhe Gjermania - nuk kane ligjeruar se po merren seriozisht me kete ceshtje, duke i lene rrugen e hapur mafias. Dhe shqiptaret, mafia, e dine kete. Arsyeja tjeter eshte se Shqiperia eshte nje vend shume i pershtatshem: duhet te kalosh vetem Adriatikun per te cuar mallin ne Itali. Kjo eshte me pak e komplikuar se sa importimi nga Maroku. Se fundi, per shkak se fshataret shqiptare kishin ekspertize. Shqiperia ka prodhuar kanabis, qe gjate epokes komuniste te Enver Hoxhes. Vendi ishte nje nga me te izoluarit ne bote, por eksportonte kanabis me ligj, vecanerisht ne Zvicer per industrine e saj farmaceutike. Pra, per ta permbledhur, bletet dhe bletaret jane viktima shqiptare te shperthimit te kultivimit te kanabisit dhe perdorimit masiv te pesticideve, por edhe te mafias lokale dhe hipokrizise se vendeve konsumatore, ky ai i yni (Franca) eshte numri 1 ne Evrope ... TV5 monde: Katastrofe e re ekologjike: zhdukja e bleteve ne Shqiperi? Problemi i ndotjes se parqeve kombetare amerikane --nga produkte kimike te perdorura ne fushat ilegale te kanabisit-- ekziston gjithashtu ne Europe. (http://information.tv5monde.com/info/legalisation-du-cannabis-aux-etats-unis-un-nouveau-probleme-ecologique-163163). Me konkretisht kjo po ndodh ne Shqiperi, prodhuesi kryesor i kanabizit ne kontinentin e vjeter. Shqiperia e ka shume te perhapur kete kulture ilegale per shkak te klimes se saj, por edhe te gjeografise: malet, shume te veshtira per t'u aksesuar, mundesojne qe te fshihen fushat me kanabis. Qeveria shqiptare, me ndihmen e fqinjit te saj italian, tenton ta ndaloje zgjerimin e ketij produkti qe ushqen trafikun ne gjithe Europen, me Francen ne krye, por pa ndonje sukses te madh. Mjalti shqiptar ka nje reputacion shume te mire dhe shume familje kane koshere ne Shqiperi. Jane rreth 142,000 koshere - pra shume - te cilat u zhduken ne mes te 2015 dhe 2016. Kjo shuarje perfaqeson 40% te koshereve ne vend. Sic eshte shpjeguar nga Le Courrier des Balkans, edhe pse dimri i ashper, dhe parazitet -qe nuk trajtohet ne menyren e duhur nga bletaret - mund te shpjegoje pjeserisht kete humbje, vrasja nuk ka ardhur nga keta faktore te vetem. Dhe ketu hyn ne loje edhe nje here, kultivimi i kanabisit. Ashtu si ne rastin e parqeve kombetare amerikane, bimet e kanabisit jane mbjelle ne pyje, ne vende te largeta per te shmangur survejimin e policise. Fermeret i trajtojne mijera bimet me pesticide te ndaluara, te vjetra, dhe ne sasi industriale per te shmangur semundjet dhe per te kontrolluar prodhimet e tyre. Ana tjeter e medaljes: bletet jane shume te ndjeshme ndaj ketyre kimikateve, vdesin ne sasi. Lufta ndaj ketij fenomeni mund te jete e komplikuar duke pasur parasysh se shume fshatare shqiptare apo refugjate te kthyer nga Greqia i jane kthyer kultivimit te kanabisit, qe edhe pse eshte i ndaluar, mundeson shitjen e nje kg kanabis per 200 dhe 300 euro per kilogram, kur toni i grurit eshte afer 600 euro ... Ne vitin 2016, forcat e rendit ne Shqiperi kane shkaterruar 2.5 milione rrenje kanabis. Vleresimet ekonomike te tregut shqiptar te kanabisit vetem per vitin 2014 jane 4,5 miliarde euro, qe eshte sa nje e treta e prodhimit te brendshem bruto te vendit. Nuk eshte rastesi qe vendi eshte etiketuar si "Kolumbia e Europes ", me nje efekt te jashtezakonshem ne mjedis, nese nuk do te merret asnje mase per te ndaluar genocidin qe po ndodh me bletet./Monitor Levizje te postimet Postime me te vjetraPostime me te reja Kerko Kerko per: TE FUNDIT Noren, Tunen dhe Adelina Ismailin, Fjolla Morina sulmon publikisht koleget Florian Binaj:Nese nuk do isha me gruan, do isha lidhur me kete moderatore Nata e zeze e Kombetares, skocezet bejne 4 gola. 02:28 18 noiabria Voennoe obozrenie Voiti Registratsiia Glavnaia Novosti Mneniia Analitika Vooruzhenie Istoriia Foto i video Novoe na saite Glavnaia Reklama na saite Kontakty Ob izdanii Pravila RSS Forum Voprosy i otvety Nachat' poisk Voennoe obozrenieNovosti Novosti V Litve p'ianye bundesverovtsy ustroili draku 4 iiunia 2017 62 Chetvero voennosluzhashchikh bundesvera, nesushchie sluzhbu v mnogonatsional'nom batal'one NATO, postradali v noch' na subbotu vo vremia draki v litovskom gorode Ionava, voennye byli v netrezvom sostoianii, peredaet RIA Novosti. Vo vremia draki v Ionava postradali chetvero netrezvykh dislotsirovannykh v Litvu germanskikh voennykh, govoritsia v soobshchenii press-sluzhby litovskoi politsii.Pravookhraniteli utochnili, chto <<vo vremia intsidenta nemetskie soldaty byli odety v grazhdanskuiu odezhdu>>, a samo ChP proizoshlo ne v sluzhebnoe vremia. Na dannyi moment provoditsia dosudebnoe rassledovanie.Konflikt proizoshel v noch' na subbotu, <<v nastoiashchee vremia voennosluzhashchie prokhodiat ambulatornoe lechenie>>, dobavili v politsii.Napomnim, mnogonatsional'nye batal'ony NATO sformirovany v stranakh Baltii i Pol'she na osnovanii sammita al'iansa, proshedshego v iiule 2016 goda v Varshave. V podrazdelenii, dislotsirovannom na territorii Litvy, v etom godu nesut sluzhbu voennosluzhashchie iz Germanii (450 chelovek), Niderlandov (250), Bel'gii (100), Norvegii (200) i Liuksemburga (poka ne pribyli). NATO's Defense-Budget Battle in Charts July 10, 2018 bloomberg Leave a Comment The NATO summit that opens Wednesday is shaping up as the battle of the 2 percent, the alliance target that U.S. President Donald Trump is using to ram home his message that the U.S. gets a bad deal from allies. It's a blunt weapon.The North Atlantic Treaty Organization set a goal for members to spend a set proportion of gross domestic product on defense at a 2014 meeting in Wales. Internally, not even NATO uses the figure as a standalone measure of what makes a good ally.The 2 percent target "was a politically acceptable compromise" that NATO governments agreed to "so they wouldn't have to talk about the more difficult measures," said Kathleen Hicks, director of the international security program at the Center for Strategic and International Studies, a Washington think tank. "I don't think it's the real issue for Trump either -- even if all members met the target, I think he'd still be pressuring them."As he left for ... [Read more...] about Trump Bump or Putin Push? The party is proposing an extra SEK 18 billion ($2 billion) for defense in the years 2019-2021. In the long run, the ambition is to raise the defense budget to two percent of the nation's GDP, which means a doubling compared with today, national broadcaster SVT reported. Conservative leader Ulf Kristersson has argued that the defense cuts of the past 20 years have gone "too far." According to Conservative defense policy spokesman Hans Wallmark, the most important thing at the moment is to see to that the defense agreement passed by the Swedish parliament in 2015 is implemented. REUTERS U.S. lawmakers are offering to allocate a US$250 million security assistance package to Ukraine, as they pass the 2019 defense budget draft. The U.S. House of Representatives Armed Forces Committee on May 7 presented the Fiscal Year 2019 National Defense Authorization Bill (H.R. 5515) envisaging $250 million in security assistance to Ukraine, according to the Ukrainian Embassy in the United States. "The sum proposed to be allocated for security assistance to Ukraine, including lethal weapons, is defined at $250 million, which is $100 million more than the Committee proposed to provide this fiscal year," the statement says. Cineplexx Lajme / Bote Marshim i trupave te NATO-s ne Lindje: Vringellim armesh, apo sigurim i paqes? 07.01.2017 * 11:55 0Shares Gjeneralmajori i ushtrise gjermane, Bundeswehr, Josef Blotz e quan "nje operacion te madh logjistik". Tri anije te marines se SHBA-se ngarkojne nderkohe ne Bremerhaven ngarkesen e tyre: arme dhe pajisje te brigades tankiste te divizionit te katert te kembesorise te SHBA. Gjithsej 900 makina me mallra, te cilat do te krijonin bashke nje varg prej 14 kilometrash do te kalojne ditet e ardhshme neper Gjermanine e Veriut dhe pastaj me tej ne Poloni, dhe vec tyre edhe shume autokolona me kamione. Operacioni "Atlantic Resolve" eshte nje shenje e angazhimit te vazhdueshem te SHBA per Evropen per stabilizimin e paqes, tha ne Bremerhaven Timothy McGuire, zevendeskomandanti i pergjithshem i forcave te armatosura tokesore te SHBA ne Evrope. Vitin e kaluar SHBA beri te ditur se do te dergoje nje brigade te perhershme luftarake shtese ne Evrope. Presidenti Barack Obama do t'u jape siguri para se gjithash Polonise, Estonise, Letonise dhe Lituanise, se ne pikepamje ushtarake SHBA jane prane tyre. Keto shtete ndihen te kercenuara nga agresioni rus ne Ukraine. Amerikanet jane pjese e nje strategjie te gjere te NATO-s. Qe prej ketij viti, aleanca do te stacionoje kater brigada luftarake multinacionale, secila me rreth njemije ushtare ne Poloni dhe ne tri shtetet baltike. Kjo bazohet ne nje vendim te takimit te nivelit te larte te NATO-s te gushtit te vitit te kaluar. Ne perforcimin e pranise se NATO-s ne Lindje ben pjese edhe stacionimi i nje batalioni gjerman me deri 500 ushtare ne Lituani, ne veri te te ashtuquajturit Boshllek i Suvalkit. Ky korridor i ngushte tokesor prej rreth 65 kilometrash ne vije ajrore konsiderohet si thembra e Akilit e NATO-s ne rastin e nje mbrojtjeje te mundshme te shteteve baltike. Lexo po ashtu: Ushtria amerikane zbarkon ne Gjermani, forcohet mbrojtja perballe Rusise (Video) Sekretari i Pergjithshem i NATO-s, Jens Stoltenberg e quajti para pak ditesh operacionin "te matur dhe defensiv" dhe tha se ai siguron paqen: "Ne ndodhemi ne nje situate, ne te cilen pala ruse po armatoset intensivisht dhe duket se ka vullnetin qe te perdore dhune kunder fqinjit te saj Ukraine". Behet fjale per nje "prani ushtarake, multinacionale te kufizuar, e cila do te tregoje se ne rrime te bashkuar dhe e mbrojme njeri-tjetrin". Stoltenbergu nuk do t'ia dije fare as per nje distancim te ardhshem te SHBA nen Trumpin, nga aleatet evropiane: Trumpi i ka thene atij "se ndihet i lidhur me NATO-n dhe me aleancen transatlantike. Vec kesaj, Kongresi ne SHBA sapo vendosi nje katerfishim te buxhetit per pranine e SHBA ne Evrope. Prandaj jam optimist se SHBA do t'u permbahen detyrimeve te tyre", tha Stoltenberg. Nje fjali vendimtare e Stoltenbergut megjithate duhet t'i kete zemeruar shtetet lindore te NATO-s. Ne lidhje me nje kercenim te supozuar rus, Stoltenbergu tha: "Nga Rusia nuk buron ndonje rrezik direkt per njerin nga partneret e Aleances." Njekohesisht ai tha per pranine e NATO-s se "behet fjale per disa mijera ushtare ne krahasim me dhjetera mijera ushtaret ruse." Pikerisht ne keto raporte forcash e shohin strateget problemin. Sepse po te doje Rusia, ne saje te epersise se saj te madhe ushtarake ne rajon ajo mund t'i marre pa mundim te pakten tri vendet baltike. Ne kete perfundim arrijne politikane perendimore te mbrojtjes. Ne nje analize te qendres kerkimore amerikane RAND, per te cilen bashkepunuan edhe ish-Komandanti i Pergjithshem i NATO-s, Wesley Clark dhe ish- Komandanti i NATO-s, Egon Ramms, thuhet se Rusia mund ta pushtoje lehte lidhjen tokesore midis Polonise dhe Shteteve Baltike, Boshllekun Suvalki. "Kembesoria e NATO-s nuk do te ishte ne gjendje as te terhiqej. Ajo do te shkaterrohej ne vend. Do te mbetej vetem perpjekja e rimarrjes se vendeve baltike. Por kjo do te perfundoje ne katastrofe", thuhet ne studim. Per vendet baltike keto nuk jane rezultate qetesuese. /DW/ BundeswehrLindjeNATO Hapet Suna Sport Outlet ne Peje - zgjedhje dhe zbritje te shumta ju presin Me rastin e 30 vjetorit te biznes Suna Sport hap piken SunaSport Outlet ku do te kete zbritje -50% ne brendet Adidas, Nike, Reebok, Puma dhe Converse. BAURMode und Wohnen Starke Angebote fur Heimwerker Sie sind hier: Home > Politik > Ausland > Europaische Union > Trump und die Nato: Auch Kauder fordert europaische Armee t-online.de ist ein Angebot der Stroer Content Group Trump und die Nato Auch Kauder fordert europaische Armee 12.11.2016, 17:46 Uhr | ckr mit Material von Reuters Europaer unter sich: deutsche Soldaten bei einem Manover in Polen (Quelle: dpa) Teilen Pinnen Twittern Drucken Mailen Redaktion Schon seit Tagen warnen Amerika-Kenner: Mit der Wahl Trumps seien die Zeiten vorbei, in denen sich Europa bedingungslos auf den Schutz der USA verlassen kann. Europa - konfrontiert mit einem russischen Nachbarn, der sich mit Gewalt seine Grossmacht-Rolle zuruckerobern will - musse sich endlich auf sich selbst besinnen. Mehr zum Thema "Gute Gelegenheit": Russland wittert nach Trump-Wahl Morgenluft Wie allein ist Europa?: Trump und die Nato: "Die Amerikaner meinen es ernst" Wie weit das gehen kann, daruber fallen die Meinungen auseinander: Manche Pro-Europaer wunschen sich eine europaische Armee - so EU-Kommissionsprasident Jean-Claude Juncker. Er erhalt jetzt Ruckendeckung von Unions-Fraktionschef Volker Kauder. "Jetzt sollten die Weichen fur eine europaische Armee gestellt werden", sagte der CDU-Politiker der "Passauer Neuen Presse" auf die Frage, was die Wahl von Donald Trump zum nachsten US-Prasidenten fur Europa bedeute. "Europa wird ohnehin mehr Verantwortung ubernehmen mussen." Aktuelle Nachrichten im Video SPD will Burgergeld "Gelbwesten" protestieren gegen Treibstoffsteuer Tausende Migranten warten an US-Grenze 17-Jahriger im Harz vermisst Verkehrskontrolle eskaliert: Fahrer eroffnet sofort das Feuer Sechs Verletzte bei Verkehrsunfall in Hamburg US-Experten entdecken verschollenes U-Boot Angela Merkel zum Burgerdialog in Chemnitz Endergebnis bestatig Grune als zweitstarkste Kraft Seehofer will CSU-Vorsitz abgeben Vorabendserie "Lindenstrasse" endet Haldenwang als Maassen-Nachfolger vorgestellt Nordkorea testet neue "taktische Waffe" Zwei Schiffe kollidieren und treiben auf See Lange Haftstrafen fur Rote Khmer "Europaisch wirksame Strukturen" Bereits Prasident Barack Obama, der am Donnerstag in Berlin erwartet wird, habe Deutsche und Europaer aufgefordert, mehr fur Sicherheit und Verteidigung zu tun." Deshalb werde der Verteidigungsetat auch aufgestockt. Rainer Arnold (SPD), Obmann im Verteidigungsausschuss des Bundestages, hatte am Donnerstag zu t-online.de gesagt, er halte eine europaische Armee bislang "fur eine Vision". Auch Arnold fordert allerdings, die einzelnen Armeen Europaer mussten ihre Kapazitaten aufeinander abstimmen. "Wir geben insgesamt 270 Milliarden Dollar fur Streitkrafte aus - das sind mehr als 40 Prozent der US-Ausgaben. Dafur bekommen wir aber nur 15 bis 20 Prozent der Fahigkeiten, die die USA haben", Arnold. Es habe keinen Sinn, immer mehr Geld hineinzugeben, ohne wirklich europaisch wirksame Strukturen zu schaffen, "mit militarischer Zusammenarbeit und mit politischen Prozessen, die das wirksam werden lassen. Das ist jetzt angesagt." EU-Minister wollen Verteidigungsunion beschliessen Die EU-Verteidigungsminister werden Anfang kommender Woche uber eine engere sicherheitspolitische Zusammenarbeit beraten. Dies war in den vergangenen Jahren stets von Grossbritannien verhindert worden, das eine Doppelstruktur zur Nato befurchtete. Nun will Grossbritannien aber aus der EU ausscheiden. Nachrichten des Tages left 1 2 right Migranten an US-GrenzeIhr Traum vom besseren Leben gilt dort so gut wie Nichts. mehr Scharfer Widerspruch aus der UnionNahles will Hartz IV abschaffen - und durch "Burgergeld" ersetzen. mehr Kritik am UN-MigrationspaktSachsen-Anhalts CDU stellt sich gegen Kanzlerin Merkel. mehr Frankreich in AufruhrEine Tote, uber 200 Verletzte bei Protesten gegen Benzinpreise. mehr Beschlossen werden soll eine europaische Verteidigungs- und Sicherheitsunion dann auf dem EU-Gipfel im Dezember. Allerdings geht es dabei zunachst um eine engere Zusammenarbeit der Streitkrafte der 27 EU-Staaten ohne Grossbritannien. Das Fernziel einer gemeinsamen Armee, fur die sich auch Aussenminister Frank-Walter Steinmeier (SPD) bereits ausgesprochen hatte, ist dagegen umstritten. Ke tu sau cac vu tan cong ngay 11/9/2001, Chinh phu My da chi toi 3,6 nghin ty USD cho an ninh noi dia. Tuy nhien, hien tai, nguoi My cam thay khong an toan. TIN LIEN QUAN My: Ung cu vien Tong thong lai tranh cai ve chinh sach Quan he an ninh My - Tho Nhi Ky khong bi suy giam Bao cao do Vien cac Van de Cong cong va Quoc te cua Truong dai hoc Brown o bang Rhode Island, My cong bo ngay 10/9 cho biet: Trong hai nam qua, khoan chi tieu voi ly do la de dam bao an ninh cho nuoc My da tang manh, dac biet la tang them toi 300 ty USD chi trong rieng trong nam 2015. Neu tinh ca du kien chi tieu cho nam 2017, tong chi phi cho cuoc chien chong khung bo se len toi con so khong lo: 4,79 nghin ty USD. Hinh minh hoa. (Nguon: Bloomberg) Tuy nhien, bat chap nhung khoan chi hang nghin ty USD nay, nguoi dan My van khong cam thay an toan hon. Cuoc khao sat gan day do Hoi dong cac Van de The gioi cua thanh pho Chicago phat hien thay khoang 42% nguoi My cam thay kem an toan hon so voi truoc thoi diem 11/9 - muc tang dang giat minh so voi ty le 27% cua cuoc khao sat tuong tu hoi nam 2014. Nhung khoan chi tieu khong lo cho an ninh noi dia la thu pham chinh khien no cong cua My tang vot (dang tien gan toi nguong 20.000 ty USD). Theo uoc tinh, toi nam 2023 chi rieng tien lai phai tra cho cac khoan chi phuc vu cac chien dich danh don phu dau o nuoc ngoai se khien no cong tang them hon 1.000 ty USD. Va toi nam 2053, tien lai phai tra cho cac khoan chi chong khung bo cung len toi it nhat la 7.900 ty USD neu nhu My khong thay doi cach thuc tien hanh chien tranh. Van de chi tieu quoc phong trong mot khoan ngan sach ngay cang bi Quoc hoi thu hep khien nuoc My gap nhieu van de. (Nguon: National Priorities) Gioi hoc gia My cho rang, van de nam o cho cac nghi si Quoc hoi dong y cap cho Lau Nam Goc va mot so co quan lien bang khac hang ty USD sau su kien 11/9, song lai khong dua ra loi giai cho bai toan lay nguon kinh phi nay tu dau. Trong cac cuoc chien tranh truoc day, Chinh phu lien bang ap dung co che "thuc thu thuc chi", trong do bao gom cac bien phap nhu ap thue chien tranh hay phat hanh trai phieu chien tranh. Tuy nhien, co che nay khong the duoc ap dung doi voi cuoc chien chong khung bo toan cau. Mot van de nua la tinh trang lam dung ngan sach an ninh noi dia kha tran lan. Nhung chuong trinh phat trien he thong vu khi ton kem, doi khi khong giup ich gi cho cuoc chien chong khung bo, la thu pham khien ngan sach quoc phong ngay cang phinh to. Ngoai ra, tinh trang gian lan va lam dung trong cong trinh tai thiet cung da lam that thoat hang ty USD, dac biet la tai Afghanistan. G20 tim giai phap cho an ninh mang toan cau Nhung yeu kem trong viec quan ly cac hoat dong tren Internet da kim ham su dong gop cua no doi voi tang truong toan ... Duc ngan chan cac phan tu khung bo tra tron vao luc luong vu trang Cuc Phan gian quan su (MAD) cua Duc vua dua ra ke hoach kiem tra an ninh doi voi cac ho so dang ky gia ... Cong nghe thong tin cua khung bo "lam kho" cac co quan an ninh Viec to chuc khung bo dang tich cuc su dung mang internet va cac ung dung duoc bao mat khac de trao doi thong tin ... Voiti v akkaunt Khotite naslazhdat'sia polnoi versiei, a takzhe poluchit' neogranichennyi dostup ko vsem materialam? .topBanner { margin-bottom: 10px; } .topBanner iframe { margin: auto; display: block; } .topBanner iframe div { text-align: center !important; } .mt-fs-click { text-align: center !important;] } NATO prosto umoliaet o voine 06:55 10.10.2017 v rubrike Politika Iurii Makarenko 2346 33 0 Severoatlanticheskii al'ians fakticheski perestupil krasnuiu chertu i uzhe umoliaet o voine. Khotia ofitsial'no sozhaleet o mire. Dva pokazatel'nykh zaiavleniia prozvuchalo segodnia na zasedanii Parlamentskoi assamblei NATO v Bukhareste. General'nyi sekretar' al'iansa Iens Stoltenberg zaviol uzhe standartnuiu akkuratno-agressivnuiu pesniu v adres Rossii, posetovav na nedostatochnuiu prozrachnost' v voprose organizatsii voennykh uchenii. Vo glavu ugla gensek na etot raz postavil <<Zapad 2017>>. Vse chleny NATO znatno strukhnuli (v perevode s diplomaticheskogo) kogda armiia RF nachala provodit' planovye maniovry v ramkakh uchenii v Belorussii i snova prochuvstvovali svoiu uiazvimost'. Iens uveriaet, chto NATO ne zhelaet izolirovat' Rossiiu i vozvrashchat'sia k Kholodnoi voine, no pri etom ostavliaet za soboi pravo vybora, to est' pervogo vystrela. Stoltenberg takim obrazom v ocherednoi raz v meru vitievato prosto poprosil o voine i dazhe chastichno ob'iasnil eio neobkhodimost' dlia al'iansa. Tochki nad i v etom <<miroliubivom>> obrashchenii postavil prezident prinimaiushchei storony, rumynskii lider Klaus Iokhannisa, anonsirovav novye maniovry NATO u zapadnykh granits Rossii. Al'ians planiruet v blizhaishem zhe budushchem skontsentrirovat' mnogonatsional'nuiu gruppirovku svoikh voisk vdol' vostochnogo flanga RF. Estestvenno, dlia togo, chtoby sderzhat' rastushchee prisutstvie rossiiskogo flota v Chiornom more. Okolo tysiachi amerikanskikh soldat uzhe prisoedinilis' k svoim kollegam iz 10 stran chlenov al'iansa i zaniali svoi pozitsii. Iokhannis tozhe govorit o mire, a ne o voine, pripravliaia otkrovenno agressivnye zaiavleniia standartnym <<demokratichnym>> slovobludiem. NATO, iakoby zhelaia mira, prosto umoliaet o voine i v dannom sluchae fakticheski perekhodit za chertu dopustimogo. Interesno, kak daleko gotovy poiti eti <<miroliubivye druz'ia>> v svoikh popytkakh sprovotsirovat' Rossiiu, i ne reshil li Tramp povremenit' s KNDR, vybrav bol'shoi kostior v Evrope, iskry kotorogo ego mogut i ne zatsepit'? Menu Reviews and Sneak Peaks Subscriber Pictures Past Boxes Press Releases Current Promos OUR PROCLAIMED NATIONAL HOLIDAY Meet The Team Shop February 9th National Pizza Day Tag: US Army May 19th Armed Forces Day May Holidays, Unboxing the Bizarre Today we celebrate those branches of military service that have served our country since it began. The day was created by Secretary of Defense Louis Johnson on August 31, 1949. It was signed into law by President Harry Truman on February 20, 1950. Finally beginning to be celebrated later that same year on May 19th. Prior to today, each branched celebrate their own birthdays, such as the US Army who formed in 1775. Obviously they were around for the American Revolution and have served as the main battle force ever since. The Navy formed the same year since the Revolutionary War took to the seas as well as on land. Ill prepared, the US Navy did a tremendous job with the few ships they had in service. The Marines formed as well in 1775, serving primarily aboard the ships as sharpshooters and landing forces. Since then the Marines have been the first to arrive in nearly every military engagement America has been involved in. To many people's surprise, the US Air Force did not form in 1947. Prior to that it was a part of the US Army. Today it is a major strike force and a very deterrent defense against aggressors. During World War 2 the air force (Army) were among the few forces that could actually win against the mighty German Tiger tanks. And far too often forgotten is the US Coast Guard. These men and women are known more for saving lives on the seas but it is their job to protect our borders from drugs, other illegal substances and invaders. While the US Navy is charged with foreign service it is the Coast Guard who keep watch at home. How to celebrate - Thank those who serve, and have served, in our military forces. Study the history of each branch more closely. Be proud to be an American. Menu Reviews and Sneak Peaks Subscriber Pictures Past Boxes Press Releases Current Promos OUR PROCLAIMED NATIONAL HOLIDAY Meet The Team Shop February 9th National Pizza Day Tag: Coast Guard August 4th U.S. Coast Guard Day August Holidays, Unboxing the Bizarre It is often the forgotten branch of the defense of our country but over the years it has been the single branch of the service solely devoted to the defense of the United States. Created by the U.S. Congress on August 4th, 1790 it was first known as the Revenue Cutter Service, it's primary duty to ensure all good brought into the country were both legal and subject to tariffs and taxes. Originally formed under the guidance of, yes, Alexander Hamilton, (I'm not sure if it's in the musical "Hamilton" or not but it should be) and evolved from tax and tariff duty to include search and rescue, along with defense. Even though outside of it's role it did serve sort of as an offensive group during World War 2 as many of the landing craft used to invade our enemies were piloted by Coast Guard trained helmsmen. They became the police, and fire rescue of the coastal waterways, rivers and lakes of America. The Revenue Cutter Service was changed to the U.S. Coast Guard in 1915 and today are a vital part of Homeland Security. But most of us know them best for the search and rescue of those in need in the water. They have saved untold thousands of people that would have perished otherwise. Like most of the services, they have their own academy where students are educated in various different majors but include service to the Coast Guard. There are many, many unsung heroes that have given their all to help others and keep our country safe. Their motto, "Semper Paratus" meaning "Always Ready". We owe a lot to our men and women of the Coast Guard. They are the most forgotten of all our military services mainly because instead of causing death and destruction, they save and build. How to celebrate - Read about the history of the Coast Guard. Thank any you see who serve in the Coast guard for their service. Go see "Hamilton" and see if the Coast Guard is mentioned in the show. August 4, 2018July 10, 2018 Unboxing the BizarreAugust, Coast Guard, Lake, military, Ocean, police, Revenue Cutter Serive, riverLeave a comment May 28th Memorial Day May Holidays, Unboxing the Bizarre May 28th Memorial Day Today we remember those who have perished in the defense of our country during their military service. It is the supreme sacrifice in order that others may live free, not something we should take lightly. The day came after the Civil War, first known as Decoration Day when Southern families remembered their dead by placing flowers and other decoration on the graves. Since 1971 it has been known better as Memorial Day. How to celebrate - Remember the fallen who fell for you. Visit the tomb of the Unknown Soldier. Honor those who still serve in the military. May 28, 2018May 21, 2018 Unboxing the BizarreAir Force, Army, Coast Guard, fallen heroes, marines, Memorial Day, military, Navy, supreme sacrifice, Unknown soldierLeave a comment May 19th Armed Forces Day May Holidays, Unboxing the Bizarre Today we celebrate those branches of military service that have served our country since it began. The day was created by Secretary of Defense Louis Johnson on August 31, 1949. It was signed into law by President Harry Truman on February 20, 1950. Finally beginning to be celebrated later that same year on May 19th. Prior to today, each branched celebrate their own birthdays, such as the US Army who formed in 1775. Obviously they were around for the American Revolution and have served as the main battle force ever since. The Navy formed the same year since the Revolutionary War took to the seas as well as on land. Ill prepared, the US Navy did a tremendous job with the few ships they had in service. The Marines formed as well in 1775, serving primarily aboard the ships as sharpshooters and landing forces. Since then the Marines have been the first to arrive in nearly every military engagement America has been involved in. To many people's surprise, the US Air Force did not form in 1947. Prior to that it was a part of the US Army. Today it is a major strike force and a very deterrent defense against aggressors. During World War 2 the air force (Army) were among the few forces that could actually win against the mighty German Tiger tanks. And far too often forgotten is the US Coast Guard. These men and women are known more for saving lives on the seas but it is their job to protect our borders from drugs, other illegal substances and invaders. While the US Navy is charged with foreign service it is the Coast Guard who keep watch at home. How to celebrate - Thank those who serve, and have served, in our military forces. Study the history of each branch more closely. Be proud to be an American. May 19, 2018May 14, 2018 Unboxing the BizarreArmed Forces, Coast Guard, defense, history, May, military, US Air Force, US Army, US Marines, US Navy, WarLeave a comment August 7th National Lighthouse Day August Holidays, Unboxing the Bizarre August 7th National Lighthouse Day Over the years, it's hard to imagine how many lives these beacons of light have saved. Built to warn of dangerous coast lines, hazardous shoals, and designate safe entry points to harbors, these lighthouses guide ships, and now planes, to safety. The first known lighthouse in America was in St. Augustine, built in 1586. The United States formed the US Bureau of Lighthouses in 1789, eventually giving over control to the Coast Guard. How to celebrate - Visit a lighthouse near you, Most lighthouses had caretakers that kept the light lit, study the history of those heroes of the seas. Build your own mini-lighthouse in your yard. August 7, 2017August 7, 2017 Unboxing the BizarreAugust, Coast Guard, Lighthouse, Ocean, waterwaysLeave a comment May 20th Armed Forces Day May Holidays, Unboxing the Bizarre Nearly every country in the world owes their existence to the men and women who fought to allow civilians to live where they live, countries to grow where they have grown and civilization to thrive where it has been born. War is not brought on by soldiers, it is brought on by politics that get out of control or greed that civilians create. Yet it almost always seems to be the soldier that pays the ultimate price. Britain ruled a great deal of the world by the deployment of it's Navy, America has enjoyed it's freedom because of the Navy and even the great empires of history have had powerful navies, even when landlocked. And while the Navy protects us from large scale land invasion, the Coast Guard keeps us safe from those that might slip through the cracks. They also protect us from many of the stupid things we do, like sailing without life preservers and letting the fuel run out when we go boating. Armed Forces Day was created by Secretary of Defense Louis Johnson on August 31, 1949. It was announced by President Harry Truman on February 20th, 1950. Then finally celebrated on May 20th, 1950. It honors all our fighting forces, the Marines, Army, Navy, Air Force and Coast Guard for their service from day one in America. Now I know to many of you it may get old to thank our military as much as we do. Honestly though, we cannot thank them enough, ever. None of us would be here if not for them. Most of the countries would not exist without them. And oddly enough, there would never be peace without them. How to celebrate - Thank every uniformed serviceman/woman that you see today for your life. Thank any retired serviceman/woman for their past service. Fly your flag proudly, whatever country you are in, the idea of your flag is the freedom you've been given and the soul of every soldier who has ever fought and died for you. TIN LIEN QUAN Duc khuyen nghi nguoi dan du tru luong thuc de phong khung bo Canh sat Duc pha mot am muu "cuong sat" Neu duoc thong qua, viec kiem tra an ninh voi cac ho so dang ky gia nhap luc luong vu trang Duc se bat dau tu thang 7/2017. (Nguon: DW) Theo to Welt am Sonntag so ra ngay 28/8, viec kiem tra an ninh tren giup gioi chuc Duc co the nhanh chong phat hien cac doi tuong cuc doan, khung bo va toi pham muon tra tron vao hang ngu luc luong vu trang thong qua viec xin nhap ngu theo che do quan dich ngan han de duoc huan luyen quan su. Tuy nhien, hoat dong nay doi hoi Duc phai sua doi cac quy dinh doi voi quan doi. Du kien, nhung thay doi nay se duoc Chinh phu Duc thong qua vao tuan toi. Neu duoc thong qua, viec kiem tra an ninh voi cac ho so dang ky gia nhap luc luong vu trang Duc se bat dau tu thang 7/2017. Dong thai nay to ro moi lo ngai cua cac co quan an ninh Duc truoc nhieu dau hieu cho thay cac doi tuong Hoi giao cuc doan dang tim cach gia nhap vao luc luong vu trang nuoc nay. Bang cach nay, cac phan tu Hoi giao cuc doan co the duoc dao tao ve quan su bai ban, tu do co the dung cac ky nang hoc duoc de thuc hien cac cuoc tan cong tai Duc hoac nuoc ngoai. Hien MAD dang truy lung 64 nghi can Hoi giao, 268 nghi can cuc doan canh huu va 6 nghi can cuc doan canh ta trong luc luong vu trang nuoc nay. Duc da tang cuong cac bien phap an ninh sau khi xay ra hang loat vu tan cong bao luc hoi thang 7 vua qua, trong do co hai vu tan cong duoc cho la do to chuc Nha nuoc Hoi giao (IS) tu xung thuc hien. Theo so lieu thong ke, trong nua dau nam 2016, cac co quan an ninh Duc da tien hanh dieu tra gan 800 nghi can khung bo va cac doi tuong Hoi giao cuc doan. Con so nay tang gap 7 lan cung ky nam truoc, trong khi so doi tuong bi buoc toi cung tang gap 5 lan. Ngoai ra, an ninh Duc cung nghi nhan 1.070 truong hop phat tan tren mang cac noi dung lien quan toi thanh chien Hoi giao, nhu tuyen truyen cho IS, al-Qaeda, de doa hoac keu goi giet choc. Dieu gi dang xay ra o Duc Sau cac vu tan cong o cac nuoc chau Au nhu Phap, Bi,... nhung ngay gan day, lan song bao luc dang "go cua" nuoc ... Vu khung bo o Duc: Thu pham co quoc tich Duc-Iran Tai cuoc hop bao sang 23/7, Canh sat truong thanh pho Munich Hubertus Andra cho biet doi tuong 18 tuoi thuc hien vu tan cong ... Al-Qaede lai de doa tan cong khung bo Duc To chuc khung bo quoc te al-Qaeda da lan thu hai len tieng de doa se tan cong Duc trong mot doan bang ghi hinh ... Skip to content Politika Aktualitet Kadare Bota Dossier Op-Ed Mode & Makeup Art Kuriozitete Sport Showbiz Mozaik Albspirit Media/News/Publishing NATO: Marshim trupash ne Lindje Gjeneralmajori i ushtrise gjermane, Bundeswehr, Josef Blotz e quan "nje operacion te madh logjistik". Tri anije te marines se SHBA-se ngarkojne nderkohe ne Bremerhaven ngarkesen e tyre: arme dhe pajisje te brigades tankiste te divizionit te katert te kembesorise te SHBA. Gjithsej 900 makina me mallra, te cilat do te krijonin bashke nje varg prej 14 kilometrash do te kalojne ditet e ardhshme neper Gjermanine e Veriut dhe pastaj me tej ne Poloni, dhe vec tyre edhe shume autokolona me kamione. Operacioni "Atlantic Resolve" eshte nje shenje e angazhimit te vazhdueshem te SHBA per Evropen per stabilizimin e paqes, tha ne Bremerhaven Timothy McGuire, zevendeskomandanti i pergjithshem i forcave te armatosura tokesore te SHBA ne Evrope. Vitin e kaluar SHBA beri te ditur se do te dergoje nje brigade te perhershme luftarake shtese ne Evrope. Presidenti Barack Obama do t'u jape siguri para se gjithash Polonise, Estonise, Letonise dhe Lituanise, se ne pikepamje ushtarake SHBA jane prane tyre. Keto shtete ndihen te kercenuara nga agresioni rus ne Ukraine. Amerikanet jane pjese e nje strategjie te gjere te NATO-s. Qe prej ketij viti, aleanca do te stacionoje kater brigada luftarake multinacionale, secila me rreth njemije ushtare ne Poloni dhe ne tri shtetet baltike. Kjo bazohet ne nje vendim te takimit te nivelit te larte te NATO-s te gushtit te vitit te kaluar. Ne perforcimin e pranise se NATO-s ne Lindje ben pjese edhe stacionimi i nje batalioni gjerman me deri 500 ushtare ne Lituani, ne veri te te ashtuquajturit Boshllek i Suvalkit. Ky korridor i ngushte tokesor prej rreth 65 kilometrash ne vije ajrore konsiderohet si thembra e Akilit e NATO-s ne rastin e nje mbrojtjeje te mundshme te shteteve baltike. Vringellim shpatash apo sigurim defensiv i paqes? Sekretari i Pergjithshem i NATO-s, Jens Stoltenberg e quajti para pak ditesh operacionin "te matur dhe defensiv" dhe tha se ai siguron paqen: "Ne ndodhemi ne nje situate, ne te cilen pala ruse po armatoset intensivisht dhe duket se ka vullnetin qe te perdore dhune kunder fqinjit te saj Ukraine." Behet fjale per nje "prani ushtarake, multinacionale te kufizuar, e cila do te tregoje se ne rrime te bashkuar dhe e mbrojme njeri-tjetrin". Stoltenbergu nuk do t'ia dije fare as per nje distancim te ardhshem te SHBA nen Trumpin, nga aleatet evropiane: Trumpi i ka thene atij "se ndihet i lidhur me NATO-n dhe me aleancen transatlantike. Vec kesaj, Kongresi ne SHBA sapo vendosi nje katerfishim te buxhetit per pranine e SHBA ne Evrope. Prandaj jam optimist se SHBA do t'u permbahen detyrimeve te tyre", tha Stoltenberg. Shtetet Baltike ne rast rreziku nuk mbahen dot Nje fjali vendimtare e Stoltenbergut megjithate duhet t'i kete zemeruar shtetet lindore te NATO-s. Ne lidhje me nje kercenim te supozuar rus, Stoltenbergu tha: "Nga Rusia nuk buron ndonje rrezik direkt per njerin nga partneret e Aleances." Njekohesisht ai tha per pranine e NATO-s se "behet fjale per disa mijera ushtare ne krahasim me dhjetera mijera ushtaret ruse." Pikerisht ne keto raporte forcash e shohin strateget problemin. Sepse po te doje Rusia, ne saje te epersise se saj te madhe ushtarake ne rajon ajo mund t'i marre pa mundim te pakten tri vendet baltike. Ne kete perfundim arrijne politikane perendimore te mbrojtjes. Ne nje analize te qendres kerkimore amerikane RAND, per te cilen bashkepunuan edhe ish-Komandanti i Pergjithshem i NATO-s, Wesley Clark dhe ish- Komandanti i NATO-s, Egon Ramms, thuhet se Rusia mund ta pushtoje lehte lidhjen tokesore midis Polonise dhe Shteteve Baltike, Boshllekun Suvalki. Kembesoria e NATO-s "nuk do te ishte ne gjendje as te terhiqej. Ajo do te shkaterrohej ne vend." Do te mbetej vetem perpjekja e rimarrjes se vendeve baltike. Por kjo do te perfundoje "ne katastrofe", thuhet ne studim. Per vendet baltike keto nuk jane rezultate qetesuese. /DW/ Please follow and like us: Aktualitet Te rejat e horoskopit, 18 nentor 2018 Te rejat e horoskopit, 17 nentor 2017 Drama e vajzes qe u martua me kengetarin Ylber qe flirtonte me te tjera Bregdetarin e rrihte gruaja, merret ne mbrojtje nga policia Lirohen nga burgu ish-deputetet socialiste Cuko e Ndoka Kadare Sulejman Mato: Kadare, ky demiurg i letersise shqipe! Menu Reviews and Sneak Peaks Subscriber Pictures Past Boxes Press Releases Current Promos OUR PROCLAIMED NATIONAL HOLIDAY Meet The Team Shop February 9th National Pizza Day Tag: War May 19th Armed Forces Day May Holidays, Unboxing the Bizarre Today we celebrate those branches of military service that have served our country since it began. The day was created by Secretary of Defense Louis Johnson on August 31, 1949. It was signed into law by President Harry Truman on February 20, 1950. Finally beginning to be celebrated later that same year on May 19th. Prior to today, each branched celebrate their own birthdays, such as the US Army who formed in 1775. Obviously they were around for the American Revolution and have served as the main battle force ever since. The Navy formed the same year since the Revolutionary War took to the seas as well as on land. Ill prepared, the US Navy did a tremendous job with the few ships they had in service. The Marines formed as well in 1775, serving primarily aboard the ships as sharpshooters and landing forces. Since then the Marines have been the first to arrive in nearly every military engagement America has been involved in. To many people's surprise, the US Air Force did not form in 1947. Prior to that it was a part of the US Army. Today it is a major strike force and a very deterrent defense against aggressors. During World War 2 the air force (Army) were among the few forces that could actually win against the mighty German Tiger tanks. And far too often forgotten is the US Coast Guard. These men and women are known more for saving lives on the seas but it is their job to protect our borders from drugs, other illegal substances and invaders. While the US Navy is charged with foreign service it is the Coast Guard who keep watch at home. How to celebrate - Thank those who serve, and have served, in our military forces. Study the history of each branch more closely. Be proud to be an American. May 19, 2018May 14, 2018 Unboxing the BizarreArmed Forces, Coast Guard, defense, history, May, military, US Air Force, US Army, US Marines, US Navy, WarLeave a comment August 14th V-J Day August Holidays, Unboxing the Bizarre For America nearly 4 long years of war were finally over on August 14th, 1945. Many think World War 2 ended with the surrender of Germany, it did not. Japan fought on, through August 6th when the first atomic bomb was dropped, through August 9th after the second atomic bomb was dropped. V-J stands for Victory in Japan, or Victory over Japan. It actually has three dates. August 14th when Emperor Hirohito cabled the US and told them he agreed with the Potsdam Declaration and surrendered. August 15th is when the news broke that the war was over and September 2nd, when President Truman declared the war was over. The Peace Treaty was signed aboard the U.S.S. Missouri. Of course for many the war wasn't really over. Troops in the field had to get word, and accept it. Many of the Japanese refused to surrender. One soldier was still found to be hiding, and fighting, as late as 1971. Naturally, was like this never really come to a stop. In many places today the results of the war are still in effect. There are still Nazis and Japanese who felt they should have won. There are still allies who feel the world will never be justified for the insults against mankind. But for most of us, the war is over and the healing is still going on. In fact Germany and Japan have some of the mist robust economies of the world and it's because America rebuilt them. (Their people also had something to do with it.) It was the kind of war that you never get over but you can celebrate that we have agreed to be friendly again. Or at least until the next time war breaks out. How to celebrate - Celebrate with one of the few veterans from World War 2 that are still living. Remember how horrible the war was so we do not repeat it. Stop the extremes on either side because they are both wrong and we all know, two wrongs don't make a right. August 14, 2017August 13, 2017 Unboxing the BizarreAugust, Peace, Potsdam Declaration, Victory over Japan, War, World War 2Leave a comment May 8th V.E. Day May Holidays, Unboxing the Bizarre Today marks the end of the war in Europe, May 8th, 1945. The actual day was supposed to be May 9th but when the press caught wind of the day the U.S. and U.K. decided to change the date to the 8th. Russia has kept the date of May 9th originally set. The Third Reich had started the war in the 1930's, it is no doubt one of the darkest times in history. The destruction in Europe and the loss of life still leaves it's mark on society. Bombed out buildings and destroyed relics of the Normandy invasion still show themselves, some on purpose, some still under repair even nearly 70 years later. War always shows the best of man, and the worst, the heroes and the criminals, the victims and those who profit from war. Germany, and her allies, actually surrendered on May 2nd but it took time to reach the troops in the field and to arrest those involved in the atrocities associated with war. The war itself raged on with those fighting against Japan but without Germany Japan was soon to fall. We now are losing many of those veterans that fought to preserve freedom. The saddest part of that is that we as a people tend to forget the causes and effects of the war, tending to make us repeat those same mistakes. There should be no place for tyranny or greed in the world but as long as man occupies the Earth there will be. Let us hope that here will also be the heroes to bring it to an end as well. How to celebrate - Thank any veteran, not only of world war 2 but of any war, you may see for their service and sacrifice. Study the reasons for war so that you can at least try to help prevent future attrocities. Visit Europe and see the scares left behind. May 8, 2017May 7, 2017 Unboxing the BizarreEurope, Germany, May, Russia, United Kingdom, Untied States, V.E., Victory in Europe, War, World War 2Leave a comment May 30th Memorial Day May Holidays, Unboxing the Bizarre Memorial Day became official in 1868 when the Grand Army of the Republic met in Decatur, Illinois where survivors of the American Civil War from the Union side gathered to decorate the graves of their fallen comrades. Originally known as "Decoration Day" the Southern troops claim to have preceded their Union counterparts by doing the same in 1866. Either way the idea of celebrating the lives of those who fell in service to our country's armed forces has become a major holiday of remembrance in the United States. It got me thinking about how many wars our troops have been a part of since the Civil War. Some are obviously better known than others, but listed below are conflicts where soldiers fell fighting for what their country determined of value. Agree with the conflict or not, these men and women paid the ultimate sacrifice and should be honored. It wasn't always nation against nation, in some cases, it was American against American, as in the Indian Wars or the Civil War. So here we go, you may not believe how many wars we have participated in... Colorado War, Snake War, Powder River War, Red Cloud's War, Formosa Expedition... Comanche Campaign, United States Expedition to Korea, Modoc War, Red River War... Las Cuevas War, Great Sioux War of 1876, Buffalo Hunter's War, Nez Perce War... San Elizario War, Bannock War, Cheyenne War, Sheepeaters War, Victorio's War... White River War, Pine Ridge Campaign, Garza Revolution, Yaqui Wars... Second Samon Civil War, Spanish-American War, Phillippine-American War... Moro Rebellion, Boxer Rebellion, Crazy Snake Rebellion, Border War, Negro Rebellion... Occupation of Nicaragua, Bluff War, Occupation of Haiti, Sugar Intervention... Occupation of the Dominican Republic, World War 1, Russian Civil War, Posey War... World War 2, Korean War, Lebanon Crisis, Bay of Pigs Invasion, Simba Rebellion... Dominican Civil War, Vietnam War, Communist Insurgency of Thailand, Shaba II... Multinational Force in Lebanon, Invasion of Grenada, Tanker War, Invasion of Panama... Gulf War, Somali Civil War, Intervention in Haiti, Bosnian War, Kosovo War, Afghanistan... Iraq War, War in North-West Pakistan, 2011 Intervention in Libya & the War on ISIS... How to celebrate: Decorate the final resting place of someone who has fallen in service to our country. Give a thought (or prayer if you wish) to those who fell in places you have never heard of. Fly your flag proudly for those who died for it. May 30, 2016May 30, 2016 Unboxing the BizarreDecoration Day, May, Memorial Day, Soldiers, WarLeave a comment March 25, 2016 National Medal of Honor Day March Holidays, Uncategorized It is National Medal of Honor Day. A medal created for "personal acts of valor above and beyond the call of duty." Created in 1861 for the Navy, the Army soon followed with its version in 1862. An Air Force Medal of Honor was created during World War I. To date, over 3,500 Medal of Honors have been awarded to military men serving their country's needs. There were few medals offered prior to the American Civil War. In 1780, the Fidelity Medallion was offered to veterans of the Revolution. For those who went above the call of duty another medal was awarded in 1782, called the Badge of Military Merit. In 1847, a Certificate of Merit was awarded veterans of the Mexican-American War. This is truly a holiday that does not get the recognition in the mainstream that it deserves. Congress declared this day a National Holiday in 1863 when the first Medal of Honor was awarded for Jacob Parrott's actions during the Andrews Raid. Of the 24 Raiders only 6 members received this honorable distinction for their role in the "Great Locomotive Chase". Oddly, Andrews could not receive the award since he was a civilian and the award was distinctly meant to be offered only to military personnel. Eventually the The Medal of Valor was created for civilians. Other Medals of Honor were given out to civilians by mistake. Buffalo Bill received one that was later taken back, as well as Mary Edwards Walker, though hers was restored by Jimmy Carter in 1971. The most recent Medal of Honor awarded was on February 29. 2016 to Edward C. Byers Jr., U.S. Navy Senior Chief Special Warfare Operator for his role in the US Navy SEAL operation ENDURING FREEDOM, freeing American hostage Dr. Dilip Joseph. NATO, marshim trupash ne kufi me Rusine 07 Janar, 2017 13:12 | 0 shfletime Madhesia e tekstit: SHBA-ja ka nisur te bejne nje zhvendosje trupash ne skajin lindor te NATO-s. Gjeneralmajori i ushtrise gjermane, Bundeswehr, Josef Blotz e quan "nje operacion te madh logjistik", shkruan Deutsche Welle .Tri anije te marines se SHBA-se ngarkojne nderkohe ne Bremerhaven ngarkesen e tyre: arme dhe pajisje te brigades tankiste te divizionit te katert te kembesorise te SHBA. Gjithsej 900 makina me mallra, te cilat do te krijonin bashke nje varg prej 14 kilometrash do te kalojne ditet e ardhshme neper Gjermanine e Veriut dhe pastaj me tej ne Poloni, dhe vec tyre edhe shume autokolona me kamione. Operacioni "Atlantic Resolve" eshte nje shenje e angazhimit te vazhdueshem te SHBA per Evropen per stabilizimin e paqes, tha ne Bremerhaven Timothy McGuire, zevendeskomandanti i pergjithshem i forcave te armatosura tokesore te SHBA ne Evrope. Vitin e kaluar SHBA beri te ditur se do te dergoje nje brigade te perhershme luftarake shtese ne Evrope. Presidenti Barack Obama do t'u jape siguri para se gjithash Polonise, Estonise, Letonise dhe Lituanise, se ne pikepamje ushtarake SHBA jane prane tyre. Keto shtete ndihen te kercenuara nga agresioni rus ne Ukraine. Amerikanet jane pjese e nje strategjie te gjere te NATO-s. Qe prej ketij viti, aleanca do te stacionoje kater brigada luftarake multinacionale, secila me rreth njemije ushtare ne Poloni dhe ne tri shtetet baltike. Kjo bazohet ne nje vendim te takimit te nivelit te larte te NATO-s te gushtit te vitit te kaluar. Ne perforcimin e pranise se NATO-s ne Lindje ben pjese edhe stacionimi i nje batalioni gjerman me deri 500 ushtare ne Lituani, ne veri te te ashtuquajturit Boshllek i Suvalkit. Ky korridor i ngushte tokesor prej rreth 65 kilometrash ne vije ajrore konsiderohet si thembra e Akilit e NATO-s ne rastin e nje mbrojtjeje te mundshme te shteteve baltike. Vringellim shpatash apo sigurim defensiv i paqes? Sekretari i Pergjithshem i NATO-s, Jens Stoltenberg e quajti para pak ditesh operacionin "te matur dhe defensiv" dhe tha se ai siguron paqen: "Ne ndodhemi ne nje situate, ne te cilen pala ruse po armatoset intensivisht dhe duket se ka vullnetin qe te perdore dhune kunder fqinjit te saj Ukraine." Behet fjale per nje "prani ushtarake, multinacionale te kufizuar, e cila do te tregoje se ne rrime te bashkuar dhe e mbrojme njeri-tjetrin". Stoltenbergu nuk do t'ia dije fare as per nje distancim te ardhshem te SHBA nen Trumpin, nga aleatet evropiane: Trumpi i ka thene atij "se ndihet i lidhur me NATO-n dhe me aleancen transatlantike. Vec kesaj, Kongresi ne SHBA sapo vendosi nje katerfishim te buxhetit per pranine e SHBA ne Evrope. Prandaj jam optimist se SHBA do t'u permbahen detyrimeve te tyre", tha Stoltenberg. Shtetet Baltike ne rast rreziku nuk mbahen dot Nje fjali vendimtare e Stoltenbergut megjithate duhet t'i kete zemeruar shtetet lindore te NATO-s. Ne lidhje me nje kercenim te supozuar rus, Stoltenbergu tha: "Nga Rusia nuk buron ndonje rrezik direkt per njerin nga partneret e Aleances." Njekohesisht ai tha per pranine e NATO-s se "behet fjale per disa mijera ushtare ne krahasim me dhjetera mijera ushtaret ruse." Pikerisht ne keto raporte forcash e shohin strateget problemin. Sepse po te doje Rusia, ne saje te epersise se saj te madhe ushtarake ne rajon ajo mund t'i marre pa mundim te pakten tri vendet baltike. Ne kete perfundim arrijne politikane perendimore te mbrojtjes. Ne nje analize te qendres kerkimore amerikane RAND, per te cilen bashkepunuan edhe ish-Komandanti i Pergjithshem i NATO-s, Wesley Clark dhe ish- Komandanti i NATO-s, Egon Ramms, thuhet se Rusia mund ta pushtoje lehte lidhjen tokesore midis Polonise dhe Shteteve Baltike, Boshllekun Suvalki. Kembesoria e NATO-s "nuk do te ishte ne gjendje as te terhiqej. Ajo do te shkaterrohej ne vend." Do te mbetej vetem perpjekja e rimarrjes se vendeve baltike. Por kjo do te perfundoje "ne katastrofe", thuhet ne studim. Per vendet baltike keto nuk jane rezultate qetesuese. Home Lajme Bota NATO dergon 200 trupa ne veri te Afganistanit NATO dergon 200 trupa ne veri te Afganistanit on: January 09, 2017 NATO ne Afganistan ka filluar te dergoje 200 ushtare italiane dhe amerikane ne provincen e Farahut ne mbeshtetje te forcave te sigurise, me kerkese te autoriteteve lokale, theksoi sot nje zedhenes. Qe prej terheqjes se pjeses me te madhe te forcave te huaja nga Afganistani ne fund te vitit 2014, ky eshte njoftimi i dyte per nje vendosje perendimore ne te pakten dy dite, kete here ne nje province ne kufi me Iranin ku jane sinjalizuar talebane dhe anetaret e organizates se Shtetit Islamik. Pentagoni njoftoi te premte se 300 marinare amerikane do te vendoseshin ne pranvere ne Helmand, ne pjesen jugore te vendit, ku 10 prej 14 distrikteve kontrollohen nga talebanet, percjell Atsh. "Me kerkese te guvernatorit te provinces se Farahut, gjeneralit John Nicholson (komandant i operacionit te NATO-s "Resolute Support") ka autorizuar dergimin e nje ekspedite ushtarake prej rreth 200 trupash te koalicionit ne mbeshtetje te Forcave te Mbrojtjes dhe sigurise afgane", theksoi zedhenesi i NATO-s duke shtuar se behej fjale per italiane. 0SHARESShareTweet Previous Thaci: Askush nga Kosova s'eshte i ftuar ne inaugurimin e Trumpit - edhe pse disa po blejne ftesa (Video) Next Der Spiegel: Ballkani me lidere autoritare Related Articles Rrefimi i pabesueshem, 6-vjecari perfundon ne spital me 14 magnete ne stomak November 16, 2018 Njeriu me i vjeter ne bote, zbuloni sa vjec eshte November 12, 2018 Merkel mesazh botes nga Parisi November 12, 2018 Restaurant Florens Te Fundit Ne Cegran te Gostivarit mblidhen ndihma per Nikolla Gruevskin! WeapoNews.com search l`rby@ Belaruski Deutsch English Espanol Francais Polski Ukrayins'kii In Lithuania drunk bundesverein put up a fight Date: 2017-06-04 13:15:03 Views: 476 Rating: 1Like 0Dislike Share: Main/ news/ In Lithuania drunk bundesverein put up a fight Four soldiers of the bundeswehr, serving in a multinational NATO battalion, were injured in the night of saturday during a brawl in the Lithuanian city of jonava, the military was in a state of intoxication, reports RIA Novosti. During a fight in jonava suffered four drunken stationed in Lithuania by the german military, stated in the press service of the Lithuanian police. Law enforcement authorities said that "During the incident, german soldiers were dressed in civilian clothes", and the incident occurred not during working hours. At the moment pre-judicial investigation. The conflict occurred in the night of saturday, "Currently soldiers undergo outpatient treatment", added the police", added the police. We will remind, the multinational battalions formed NATO in the baltic states and Poland on the basis of the alliance summit held in july 2016 in Warsaw. The unit, stationed on the territory of Lithuania, this year, are serving members of Germany (450) netherlands (250), belgium (100), Norway (200) and luxembourg (not yet arrived). Gabriel tha se Gjermania e pranon se duhet t'i rrise shpenzimet nga norma prej 1.2%, por sipas tij do te ishte "krejtesisht joreale" te pritet nga Berlini qe te shkoje ne 2 per qind. "Gjermania duhet te beje me shume, nuk ka dyshim, por eshte krejtesisht joreale te pritet se ne do te shtojme 30 miliarde euro ne shpenzimet e mbrojtjes, gjate tete vjeteve te ardhshem", tha Gabriel. "Ne po ashtu do ta shqyrtojme nese Evropa do qe Gjermania te investoje 60 miliarde euro ne vit ne ushtri... Ky do te ishte dominim ushtarak ne Evrope dhe mendoj se fqinjet tane nuk do te donin", tha Gabriel./tvklan.al Shperndaj EtiketaDonald TrumpGjermaniaShpenzimet ne NATOKategoriBotaTe funditTe gjitha 1 Koment lexues 2 Mars 2017 at 10:21 Pergjigju Mesa di, eshte nenshkruar nje marveshje e firmosur nga te 28 shtetet antare te NATO-s qe i detyron sejcilin qe te ndaje per kete organizate, nje fond me 2% te prodhimit kombetar. Nese nje shtet i fuqishem si Gjermania nuk e perballon kete fond, c'mund te thuhet per vende shume me te dobeta ekonomikisht ? Nuk me duket e drejte qe mareveshja pasi eshte nenshkruar, te mos zbatohet nga te gjithe njelloj. Para disa ditesh, ne kundershtim me deklarimin e ministrit te jashtem, kancelarja gjermane ka deklaruar se Gjermania do ta zbatoje kete mareveshje. Edhe mund te rishihej kjo mareveshje e te ulej kontributi per NATO, por ne kushtet e nje situate te renduar konfliktuale me Rusine, karshillekun ushtarak te Korese se Veriut apo daljen e nje shteti terrorist islamik si ISIS, qe te ulen fondet e NATO-s, me duket jo fort e arsyeshme. Tri anije te marines se SHBA-se ngarkojne nderkohe ne Bremerhaven ngarkesen e tyre: arme dhe pajisje te brigades tankiste te divizionit te katert te kembesorise te SHBA. Gjithsej 900 makina me mallra, te cilat do te krijonin bashke nje varg prej 14 kilometrash do te kalojne ditet e ardhshme neper Gjermanine e Veriut dhe pastaj me tej ne Poloni, dhe vec tyre edhe shume autokolona me kamione. Operacioni "Atlantic Resolve" eshte nje shenje e angazhimit te vazhdueshem te SHBA per Evropen per stabilizimin e paqes, tha ne Bremerhaven Timothy McGuire, zevendeskomandanti i pergjithshem i forcave te armatosura tokesore te SHBA ne Evrope. Vitin e kaluar SHBA beri te ditur se do te dergoje nje brigade te perhershme luftarake shtese ne Evrope. Presidenti Barack Obama do t'u jape siguri para se gjithash Polonise, Estonise, Letonise dhe Lituanise, se ne pikepamje ushtarake SHBA jane prane tyre. Keto shtete ndihen te kercenuara nga agresioni rus ne Ukraine. Amerikanet jane pjese e nje strategjie te gjere te NATO-s. Qe prej ketij viti, aleanca do te stacionoje kater brigada luftarake multinacionale, secila me rreth njemije ushtare ne Poloni dhe ne tri shtetet baltike. Kjo bazohet ne nje vendim te takimit te nivelit te larte te NATO-s te gushtit te vitit te kaluar. Ne perforcimin e pranise se NATO-s ne Lindje ben pjese edhe stacionimi i nje batalioni gjerman me deri 500 ushtare ne Lituani, ne veri te te ashtuquajturit Boshllek i Suvalkit. Ky korridor i ngushte tokesor prej rreth 65 kilometrash ne vije ajrore konsiderohet si thembra e Akilit e NATO-s ne rastin e nje mbrojtjeje te mundshme te shteteve baltike. Vringellim shpatash apo sigurim defensiv i paqes? Sekretari i Pergjithshem i NATO-s, Jens Stoltenberg e quajti para pak ditesh operacionin "te matur dhe defensiv" dhe tha se ai siguron paqen: "Ne ndodhemi ne nje situate, ne te cilen pala ruse po armatoset intensivisht dhe duket se ka vullnetin qe te perdore dhune kunder fqinjit te saj Ukraine." Behet fjale per nje "prani ushtarake, multinacionale te kufizuar, e cila do te tregoje se ne rrime te bashkuar dhe e mbrojme njeri-tjetrin". Stoltenbergu nuk do t'ia dije fare as per nje distancim te ardhshem te SHBA nen Trumpin, nga aleatet evropiane: Trumpi i ka thene atij "se ndihet i lidhur me NATO-n dhe me aleancen transatlantike. Vec kesaj, Kongresi ne SHBA sapo vendosi nje katerfishim te buxhetit per pranine e SHBA ne Evrope. Prandaj jam optimist se SHBA do t'u permbahen detyrimeve te tyre", tha Stoltenberg. Shtetet Baltike ne rast rreziku nuk mbahen dot Nje fjali vendimtare e Stoltenbergut megjithate duhet t'i kete zemeruar shtetet lindore te NATO-s. Ne lidhje me nje kercenim te supozuar rus, Stoltenbergu tha: "Nga Rusia nuk buron ndonje rrezik direkt per njerin nga partneret e Aleances." Njekohesisht ai tha per pranine e NATO-s se "behet fjale per disa mijera ushtare ne krahasim me dhjetera mijera ushtaret ruse." Pikerisht ne keto raporte forcash e shohin strateget problemin. Sepse po te doje Rusia, ne saje te epersise se saj te madhe ushtarake ne rajon ajo mund t'i marre pa mundim te pakten tri vendet baltike. Ne kete perfundim arrijne politikane perendimore te mbrojtjes. Ne nje analize te qendres kerkimore amerikane RAND, per te cilen bashkepunuan edhe ish-Komandanti i Pergjithshem i NATO-s, Wesley Clark dhe ish- Komandanti i NATO-s, Egon Ramms, thuhet se Rusia mund ta pushtoje lehte lidhjen tokesore midis Polonise dhe Shteteve Baltike, Boshllekun Suvalki. Kembesoria e NATO-s "nuk do te ishte ne gjendje as te terhiqej. Ajo do te shkaterrohej ne vend." Do te mbetej vetem perpjekja e rimarrjes se vendeve baltike. Por kjo do te perfundoje "ne katastrofe", thuhet ne studim. Per vendet baltike keto nuk jane rezultate qetesuese. /Deutsche Welle Shperndaj EtiketaNatoSHBAStoltenbergtrupaKategoriBotaTe funditTe gjitha 0 Komente Pergjigju Mbyll Pergjigjen Emer * E-mail * Web Me te lexuarat sot Xing me Ermalin XING ME ERMALIN - EMISIONI 10 - SEZONI 3 Emisione Rreth nesh SNG Off-Air App Support Page PRIVATESIA Kontakt COPYRIGHT 2018 TV KLAN
